VI.iii.1.C.7.d
.
Discontinuing a Child’s Award When He/She Is Restored to the Surviving Spouse’s Custody
Discontinue an award to a child who is restored to the surviving spouse’s custody effective the date in the LAST PAID DATE field on the AWARD INFORMATION tab in Share.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C - Incarceration of Dependents and Certain Survivors
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
